R

Restring - Class in com.b3nedikt.restring
Entry point for Restring. it will be used for initializing Restring components, setting new strings, wrapping activity context.
Restring.StringsLoader - Interface in com.b3nedikt.restring
Loader of strings skeleton. Clients can implement this interface if they want to load strings on initialization. First the list of languages will be asked, then strings of each language.
RestringConfig - Class in com.b3nedikt.restring
Contains configuration properties for initializing Restring.

reword(parent) - Static method in class com.b3nedikt.restring.Restring
Will update the text of all views in the view hierarchy below the provided parent view. Can be used to update the texts of a activity or fragment without restarting it. To do this just use the root view of the activity or fragment.
